name: John A. GUIDO v. TOWNSHIP OF SANDY and Dubois Dutch, LLC, Petition of Dubois Dutch, LLC

parties: John A. GUIDO v. TOWNSHIP OF SANDY and Dubois Dutch, LLC, Petition of Dubois Dutch, LLC.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of August, 2003, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, limited to the following issue:
Whether a leasehold interest with an option to purchase creates a property interest in the lessee sufficient to support a subdivision under the terms of the Pennsylvania Municipalities Planning Code (MPC).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
831 A.2d 587
John A. GUIDO v. TOWNSHIP OF SANDY and Dubois Dutch, LLC, Petition of Dubois Dutch, LLC.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 27, 2003.
